name: Genesect
author: Anesaki Dynamic
flavor_text: This ancient bug Pokémon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.

abilities.name: Fast-Flight Configuration
abilities.effect: If your opponent has any Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Splitting Beam
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
